page.title: 06THE PARKS IN KILNHURST
page.content: There are two parks in Kilnhurst village. The first park is near a bus stop. It has some swings and some climbing frames made from logs of wood. There is also a garden park in which children cannot play. On the fence there is a sign saying "NO BALL GAMES". Opposite the garden park is the second park in Kilnhurst. There is a slide, a roundabout and six swings. At the second park there is also a sportsfield, a cricket pitch and football pitch, tennis courts and a bowling green. The bowling green is an exact square. The Athletic Club own this area and provide a car park and changing facilities inside the pavilion.
